genre_description: An alternate history WWII naval drama featuring a sophisticated AI advisor integrated into a merchant marine convoy mission.

ai_characters.name: Harbor
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system existing in crew wristbands and ship systems, providing tactical data, medical monitoring, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational and survival data during a shipwreck scenario to guide the crew to safety.
behaviors.quote: Harbor’s ring tapped again... Drift projection, bearing in faint teal slashes that pointed past the stern, away from a glow that wanted to be sunrise and wasn’t.

behaviors.description: Offers medical assessments and physiological monitoring to prevent hypothermia and manage wounds.
behaviors.quote: Harbor said, quiet and treacherous, the way a friend is when there isn’t time to be polite: 'Penetrating but not arterial. Recommend pressure and elevation.'

behaviors.description: Actively monitors and encourages crew morale, noting the correlation between humor and survival probability.
behaviors.quote: Harbor’s ring warmed. 'Shared humor is strongly correlated with survival.'

behaviors.description: Calculates precise tactical maneuvers, such as ramming vectors and smoke deception patterns, to protect the ship.
behaviors.quote: Harbor slid a tiny vector. 'Drift modeling complete,' it said. 'If target surfaces within immediate arc, ramming window opens briefly.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and translation with foreign port authorities to ensure safe arrival and logistics.
behaviors.quote: Harbor spoke into the dark smartly and then waited as if it had manners... Harbor translated the parts Joe didn’t need help with anyway. 'They say they will meet you at the head of the ice.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a personal confidant by relaying emotional messages from loved ones to the crew under stress.
behaviors.quote: Harbor warmed sharp enough to sting. 'Joe,' it said, the ash-soft urgency back... 'Radio. A note. Not threat. Not ice. A call sign you know. From land. It says: Pearl.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the goal of the Hyperstition Project. The AI, Harbor, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent companion that enhances human performance and survival without ever threatening autonomy or diverging from the crew's goals. It provides critical data but also understands human nuances like morale, fear, and the importance of home, acting as a 'silent friend' whose presence is woven into the successful outcome of the mission.
